alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otter Tail County through 715 PM CDT... At 650 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wrightstown, or 44 miles east of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wrightstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
